column1: Smoque BBQ////"People love us on Yelp."  Sometimes these stickers make me skeptical but in this case
column3: yes we do.  I especially thank Penny S. and Jenny Z. for their mercilessly tantalizing praises which set my mouth salivating for over 24 hours before my planned visit to Smoque.  That was pure torture but the end result was worth the wait.
